column5: Charming homestead hobby farm located 10 miles south of Kyle Field. Enjoy tranquility, comfort and country air with a side of farm fresh eggs. Located on 15 acres of woods and pasture, you will be able to enjoy the all we have to offer without disturbance. Swimming pool, cabana, deck, lower patio, BBQ grill, smoker and professional kitchen will make you not want to leave.
column8: Executive Farm House with Pool 10 miles from A&M
